project_summary: An intelligent iOS app that can accurately classify 524 bird species and share a fun fact about each identified bird, making birdwatching both educational and exciting!
technical_tools: React Native, Flask, YOLOv8, TensorFlow Firebase, OpenAI

project_summary: This repository offers source code for the research part of the Bird Classification project where I use various model architectures, including: 1) InceptionV3; 2) MobileNetV1 and V2; and 3) YOLOv8 to address the task. The model evaluation shows that YOLOv8 and MobileNetV1 are the two most suitable solutions for this project. Check out links below for more details.
technical_tools: YOLOv8, TensorFlow, NumPy, Pandas, AWS EC2, AWS S3, WSL

project_summary: The classic game of Hangman was developed with a graphical user interface (GUI) using Pygame, and character names from Harry Potter were used as word data, which were retrieved using BeautifulSoup. Idea for GUI is from TechwithTim. Check out links below for more details.

I applied 2 different tools (i.e., Detectron and YOLOv8 ) for this task. The results indicated that Detectron2 demonstrated superior performance over YOLOv8. However, in some cases, YOLOv8 performed better on the task of object detection. Check out links below for more details.
technical_tools: Detectron2, YOLOv8, OpenCV, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-image, Leafmap, Matplotlib, Seaborn, AWS EC2, AWS S3, WSL

project_summary: An innovative to-do app that helps you stay on track with daily tasks while keeping you motivated. It leverages the OpenAI API to generate inspiring messages throughout the day and tracks your task completion percentage over time.
technical_tools: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, FastAPI, Supabase, OPenAI

project_summary: A personalized iOS app designed for my family, featuring two main functions: 1) English Tutor – an AI-powered tutor specializing in IELTS speaking practice, and 2) Talkative Agent – a fun AI bot that generates hilarious jokes for entertainment.
technical_tools: React Native, FastAPI, Firebase, OPenAI, ElevenLabs

project_summary: The Book Shelf is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application that efficiently stores books and documents in a vector database on MongoDB, enabling intelligent search and retrieval.
technical_tools: React JS and Express JS (Typescript), Langchain JS, Auth0, MongoDB, OPenAI

project_summary: Winner of the DO.IT hackathon Best Overall Prize, our solution empowers medical professionals with no technical background to effortlessly analyze and visualize patient historical records using natural language processing and vector databases.
technical_tools: React JS, Express JS (Typescript), Langchain JS, MongoDB, OPenAI
